triples.name: Emotion recognition in conversation
triples.relevance: The primary task addressed by the paper for recognizing human emotions in multi-speaker conversations.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: Core concept used to integrate and process multiple data types (text, audio, visual) for emotion recognition.

triples.name: Graph neural network
triples.relevance: Foundational method used for graph-based fusion of multimodal information in conversations.

triples.name: Sentiment analysis
triples.relevance: Related task that shares techniques for analyzing emotional content in text and multimodal data.

triples.name: Attention (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Attention mechanisms are used to dynamically weight and fuse multimodal contextual information.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Fundamental field that provides techniques for processing textual modality in conversation-based emotion recognition.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel deep neural network architecture (MM-DFN) that advances dynamic fusion methods for multimodal learning.
